body_html:
Ok. So I did a number of runs over the weekend. I did see it finally happen on a single GPU so clearly the issue is not in MirroredStrategy. I did 2 CPU runs and it did not segfault but I hardly think that can be taken to be conclusive.

I am going to whittle down the model and see if I can cause it to reproduce on limited set of data and a toy model. Is there any mechanism for privately sharing code/data?

body:
Ok. So I did a number of runs over the weekend. I did see it finally happen on a single GPU so clearly the issue is not in MirroredStrategy. I did 2 CPU runs and it did not segfault but I hardly think that can be taken to be conclusive.

I am going to whittle down the model and see if I can cause it to reproduce on limited set of data and a toy model. Is there any mechanism for privately sharing code/data?
